attributes.action: make the same  motorbility project for motorcyles as for cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motability partly sponsored by the government and has the Queen as their patron implements your payment of the benefit which enables you to have a car, therefore assisting you with your freedom which everyone should have. One thing they have been overlooking for the past 30 years if the fact that disabled people have found the pleasure of having the wind blowing in their whilst riding their favourite 2/3 wheeled vehicle. There in fact hundreds possibly more like thousands of people who ride a motorcycle with a disability and the majority of them do not has the same opportunity to choose between a car or a bike  when using their  incapacity benefit to help pay for the HP of the bike. Why.?
